attributes.additional_details:
Withdraw all military assistance from Ukraine such as weapons of any description lethal/non lethal, combat troops and associated weaponry such as tanks for example, withdraw advisors, stop sending intelligence and any other aid the UK might be giving to Kiev.

This is not a conflict that concerns the UK, it is a domestic affair within Ukraine and is a waste of tax payers money not to mention angering a large nuclear armed country such as Russia which would be far better suited as an ally.
